text:
On service stop with Java 9 warnings are logged due to the use of reflection in the WebappClassLoader.

The approach of setting JDK_JAVA_OPTIONS works if the service uses the java start type, but not if jvm (the default) is used. We need a robust solution that works for all start types and supported Java versions (6 onwards since this will need to be back-ported to Tomcat 7).
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text:
Fixed in:
- trunk for 9.0.2 onwards
- 8.5.x for 8.5.24 onwards
- 8.0.x for 8.0.48 onwards
- 7.0.x for 7.0.83 onwards
